page.title: 20Johnstone Social Concerns
page.content: In Spateston today there are many social problems, too many! Vandalism is one of these problems; probably the worst.Everywhere you look there is grafitti scrawled across walls and buildings. We have open-air telephone boxes, or rather one's that have had their windows smashed in and their doors pulled off. Another problem in Spateston is drug abuse. Many people would be surprised that a small place like Spateston should have such a probem, but it has. If you go near the shopping cente at night you are sure to meet some idiot who is stoned out of his/her brain! Solvent abuse is another serious problem but in Spateston people don't just sniff glue, they take drink and drugs as well. It is mostly unemployed teenagers involved in these problems.
